meanings.definition: Capable of being broken down by light.
meanings.sent1: The photolyzable substance changed color when exposed to sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying photolyzable materials for eco-friendly purposes.
meanings.sent3: The photolyzable paint on the wall seemed to dance under the bright sun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a photolyzable barrier, fading away with each passing moment.
meanings.sent5: The concept of photolyzable plastics is easy to understand - they break down when exposed to light.

meanings.definition: Able to undergo decomposition by light.
meanings.sent1: The photolyzable compound reacted quickly to sunlight, decomposing within minutes.
meanings.sent2: The photolyzable solution in the beaker slowly decomposed under the UV light.
meanings.sent3: The photolyzable fabric looked like it was melting under the intense sun.
meanings.sent4: His trust was as photolyzable as ice, disappearing under the warmth of betrayal.
meanings.sent5: The photolyzable nature of the material made it perfect for temporary structures that could easily break down in sunlight.
